title: TRed SpeedWay Kartodrome fixie is a track bike built for urban Go Kart racing!
content:
TRed’s all-new SpeedWay Kartodrome completely reimagines their classic Manaia track bike for the unique flat go kart track racing that’s growing in the urban fixie racing scene. With huge volume tires and totally reshaped geometry built for flat, high-speed cornering, the SpeedWay Kartodrome debuted with a win and a podium at the Italian Fixed Gear […]

The post TRed SpeedWay Kartodrome fixie is a track bike built for urban Go Kart racing! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
